content.name: Two Strangers (Carry A Cake Across New York)

primaryPhoto.description:
TWO STRANGERS (CARRY A CAKE ACROSS NEW YORK) became the talk of the town when it premiered at London’s Kiln Theatre in 2023. Catch this new hit musical when it transfers to the West End’s Criterion Theatre in Piccadilly Circus this spring!
Reprising their roles as Dougal and Robin, TWO STRANGERS (CARRY A CAKE ACROSS NEW YORK) stars Olivier Award winner Sam Tutty (Dear Evan Hansen) and Dujonna Gift (Hamilton), with direction from Tim Jackson.
This intimate and refreshingly original show, written by Jim Barne and Kit Buchan, is one part “rom” and two parts “com”, with a splash of culture clash. TWO STRANGERS is the toast of 2024 – so book now, and remember the full title later.
Book your TWO STRANGERS (CARRY A CAKE ACROSS NEW YORK) theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
